name: Nightshade by Drew Estate - Robusto
additionalNotes: Drew state debuts its new cigar at the end of last year. Nightshade made at the La Gran FÃ¡brica Drew farm in Nicaragua. The cigar consists of a Connecticut Habano wrapper, followed by an Indonesian binder completed with a filling from Nicaragua and the Dominican Republic. Its characteristic name comes from the plant Solanaceae or better known as Belladonna which includes Tobacco.
